question: Steppe Library
answer: In June 2023, we organized the Stepp Library Program. In many rural parts of Tekes County in Ili, Xinjiang, just as in pastoral villages across the region, residents make their living through animal husbandry. They settle in the villages during the winter and move to the grasslands in the summer. Children also follow their families to the summer pastures during their school holidays.

question: Steppe Library
answer: During the school year, the libraries and other educational facilities at local schools are often incomplete. Many donated books never actually reach the children, creating a physical barrier between books and young readers.
